price: 19. Miyeyna u fiirsan sida Alle u billaabo abuuridda (uunka), haddana u soo celin? Hubaal arrinkaasi Alle wuu u fudud yahay.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
